# allocator

**Instance Property**

Obtain a stack-disciplined job-local allocator.

## Declaration

```swift
var allocator: ExecutorJob.LocalAllocator? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the job does not support allocation, this property will be `nil`.
title: allocator
